title: Tinkerer's Workshop
summaries: The Tinkerer's Workshop is a crafting station that is used primarily to combine multiple accessories into single items that usually provide the abilities of all. For instance, it can combine the Rocket Boots and Hermes Boots into a single item (the Spectre Boots) that provides the same rocket-jumping and accelerated movement as the individual items did, without occupying two accessory slots. The Tinkerer's Workshop is purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer for 10 GC.

(Desktop, Console, Old-gen console and Mobile versions) When combining items, the Tinkerer's Workshop will assign a new random modifier to the crafted item. The modifiers the individual items had beforehand do not influence the modifier of the new combined item.
(3DS version) Items crafted at the Tinkerer's Workshop will be assigned no modifier.

The Tinkerer's Workshop is also used to craft most of the unrecordable <linked>Music Boxes</linked>, and on <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, <linked>Boulders</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the combining of some accessories
statistics.Buy: 10 GC
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
